info.label: Software Engineer
info.brief: **Full-stack software developer with 6+ years industry experience** specializing in scalable cloud architectures for this, that, and the other. A native of southern CA, Jane enjoys hiking, mystery novels, and the company of Rufus, her two-year-old beagle.

employment.summary: 7+ years industry IT and software development experience.

highlights: Design database architecture for new information system (MYLink)
Maintain web server, database server and file server
Consult with stakeholders on features and components of the system
Integrate the system with university data services

education.summary: Information Technology Major with a Computer Science Minor

highlights: Oversee management of 501(c)(3) non-profit organization and distribution of funds
Propose service opportunities to benefit individuals and large organizations

history.organization: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints
highlights: Developed and implemented multi-conference training plans
Managed data collection, analysis, and reporting
Supervised work and welfare of 100 full-time volunteers

list.name: Ruby

projects.title: AutoSpell SublimeText 3 Plugin
projects.description: Sublime Text 3 packge to auto replace spelling mistakes.
projects.summary: When switching from vim to Sublime Text I missed the ability to add mappings for mispelled words. I created this plugin to solve that problem and it has since been downloaded over 5,000 times.

projects.title: Qualtrics Offline Surveys App (iOS/Android)
projects.description: The Qualtrics Offline Surveys App allows you to download and manage your surveys from the Qualtrics Research Suite. Surveys can be stored for offline use and responses can be submitted when an internet connection is available.

projects.title: Web & Mobile Evaluation System for BYU College of Nursing
projects.description: Web-based administration portal and mobile app for field work to evaluate performance of nursing students in the field.
projects.summary: Member of a team that used UX and Agile development methods to engineer a working web and mobile iPad system for field evaluation of predicators and nurses for the BYU College of Nursing.

interests.name: reading
interests.summary: Wes is a fan of fantasy novels. His favorite authors are Orson Scott Card and Brandon Sanderson.

interests.name: hiking
interests.summary: Wes grew up close to 5 different canyons and enjoys hiking to water feature destinations. His tallest summit is Half Dome in Yosemite National Park.
